2.「キサマが どうぐ使いとして| どこまで成長したか 見たくなったのだ。| ちょっ: I wanted to see how far Kisama had come as a|tool user. Just a little.

3.「とにかく 天才魔道学者である ワガハイが| 直々に 特訓をつけてやるのだから|: Anyway, you should be thankful that Wagahai,|a genius magus, is giving you a crash course|in the art of magic in person! Ha-ha-ha!

4.「よし。では 始めるとしよう。| まずは マスターキーを………: Okay. Let's get started. First, the master|key...

7.「ぬぬぬぬ……。| キサマは 地上制圧隊の偵察兵か？| こんなにも早く 見つかっ: Nuh-nuh-nuh. Is that you, Xama, a scout for|the ground troops? I can't believe they|found us so quickly.

8.「言わなくとも わかっておるぞ。| ワガハイを 魔界に連れ戻す気だろう？: You don't have to say it. You're going to|take Wagahai back to the demon world, aren't|you?

9.「その通りだ。我々に 逆らったら| どうなるかは キサマも知っているはずだ。|: Well... You know what happens if you cross|us. Now, we're going back to the demon world|together, okay?

11.「なに……？ キサマ 今 なんと言った？: What...? What did you just say, Kisama?

12.「ふははは！ ノーと 言ったのだ！| 天才であるワガハイは 誰にも束縛されん！|: Ha-ha-ha! I said no! Wagahai, the genius|that he is, is bound to no one! There was no|way I was going back to the demon world!

13.「研究員の分際で いい気になりおって！| ならば チカラずくで 連れ戻すまでだ！: You're just a researcher, and you think|you're so smart! Then I'll do everything in|my power to bring him back!

14.「ふははは！ キサマら偵察兵ごとき| この ワガハイが 相手をするまでもないわ！: Ha-ha-ha! You and your scouts, you wagahai,|have no business dealing with them!

16.「せっかく 逃げおおせたのに| また ここに戻ってくるとは おろかだな！| デル: You're a fool to come back here after you've|managed to escape! Delcroix, the researcher!

17.「ぬぬぬ……。まだ この辺りにいたとは| ワガハイとしたことが ぬかったわ。|: No no no. I didn't know you were still|around here. I'm completely surrounded.

18.「ふははは！ よいところに来た 原住民よ！| 特訓は ひとまず おあずけにしてや:
Ha-ha-ha! Good place to be, natives! I'm|putting off your training for now! Right|now, we need to focus on defeating these|
|bastards!

20.「ま まさか 地上制圧隊の偵察兵を| 倒してしまうとは……。: I never thought he'd beat a scout for ground|control.

21.「ふははは！ ワガハイが生み出した| どうぐ使いなら 勝って当然と言えよう！: Ha-ha-ha! A tool user created by Wagahai|deserves to win!

22.「まあ この戦いで キサマの実力の程は| よくわかったからな。| 今回の特訓は: Well, this battle has shown us just how good|you are. I'm not going to train this time.

23.「アストルティアのサルが| 魔物を 従えているとはな……。: I didn't know that the monkeys of Astoltia|were followed by demons.

25.「デルクロア研究員よ 覚悟しておけ！| アストルティアのサルと 組んでいることを: Delcroix researchers, brace yourselves! I'm|going to report you to the mainland for|working with the monkeys of Astoltia!

26.「ぬぬぬぬ……。なんてことだ。| 生き残りがいたとは 気づかなかった……。: No, no, no, no. Oh, my God. I didn't realize|there were survivors.

27.「ああ……いったい どうすれば……。| まずい まずい まずい……。| このまま: Oh... What the hell am I supposed to do? Oh,|no, no, no. He's gonna come.

28.「ふ……ふははは！ 何を見ておる！| これぐらいは 計算通りである！| 奴が 報: Fu... Ha-ha-ha! What are you looking at?|This much I have calculated! I knew he was|going to report it!

29.「さあ！ ボケっと 突っ立っておるでない！| ワガハイの研究室に戻るぞ！ 原住民: Come on! Don't just stand there! We're going|back to the Wagahai lab! Natives!

30.「ふははは！ どうやら ワガハイの過去が| 気になって 気になって 仕方ないよう: Ha-ha-ha! It seems you're curious about|Wagahai's past, and you can't help it! Very|well, let's hear it!

31.「魔界にいた頃のワガハイは さる大貴族に| 飼われている 地上制圧隊の指揮下にあ: Wagahai, when he was in the demon world, was|kept by a nobleman in an R&D lab under the|command of a ground control team.

32.「その 研究開発室での仕事というのは| チカラだけが取り柄の 地上制圧隊の魔物を: The job at the R&D lab is to enhance the|demons of the ground troops, whose strength|is all they have.

33.「だが 最初から強い魔物を 強くするなど……| そんな研究が おもしろかろうハズ: But if a demon is strong from the start, it|will become stronger... Such a research|would be interesting...

34.「ワガハイは 自分の好きな研究に没頭するため| 魔界に見切りをつけ アストルティ:
Wagahai gave up on the demon world and came|to Astoltia to devote himself to his|favorite research. Well, this is how it's|
|done.

35.「アストルティアの原住民に| ワガハイが 過去のことを話すなど| 滅多に ないの: How often does a Wagahai tell the natives of|Astoltia about his past? Thank you.

36.「……偵察兵を 取り逃がしたとなると | 遠からず 地上制圧隊 本隊からの追っ手: ... If we let the scout get away, we'll soon|be pursued by the main ground troops.

37.「きっと その追っ手を <pc>さんに| 追い払ってもらうため ご主人さまは|: I am sure that in order to get rid of his|pursuers, <pc>, the master|decided to confide in him about his past.

38.「いつ 追っ手が来てもいいように修行して| 準備ができたら また どうぐ使いにな:
I want you to train so that you will be|ready whenever your pursuers come after you,|and when you are ready, I want you to become|
|a tool user and come back here again.
